
linegraph 15
linegraph Create a linegraph

#### Description 

The line graph of G, here denoted L(G), is the graph whose nodes correspond to the edges of G
and whose edges correspond to nodes of G such that nodes of L(G) are joined if and only if the
corresponding edges of G are adjacent in G.

#### Usage
<pre><code>

linegraph(x, ...)

</code></pre>
#### Arguments 

x graph of class graph or loongraph
... 
</code></pre>

 passed on to method
